content: लुप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [लुप्-क्त] {@--1@} Broken, violated, injured, destroyed. {@--2@} Lost, deprived of; <ls>R. 14. 56.</ls> {@--3@} Robbed, plundered. {@--4@} Dropped, elided, disappeared (in <ab>gram.</ab>). {@--5@} Omitted, neglected. {@--6@} Obsolete, disused, out of use; see लुप्. --प्तं Stolen property, booty.
